Coming soon to iOS.

How?

Meetingroom is re-inventing remote meetings. Hold simultaneous discussions whilst on-the-go, Meetingroom will keep track of your context.

  • Define a clear agenda.
  • Communicate with voice recordings.
  • Catch up when it suits you.
  • Spin clockwise to fast forward, vice versa.
  • Add attachments and notes.
  • Audio transcription service.
